bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) of mental confusion, in extreme cases: coma. Su wen 素問 70: 其病昏惑悲忘 , “Its illnesses are clouding , sadness, and forgetfulness”.
b) Of dim-sightedness; dim vision. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 年至四十，即漸眼昏 , “When one has reached the age of 40, gradually dim vision sets in”.

②Functional disturbance. Jia you bu zhu Shen nong ben cao 嘉祐補註神農本草 Substance Entry shu mi 黍米：昏五藏，令人好睡 , “Must not be consumed for long as it disturbs the functions of the five depots. It gives people good sleep”.
